page.title: 19A TYPICAL WEEKEND DAY
page.content: MY HOME LIFE IS SUCH THAT I WAKE UP AT SIX THIRTY AND DO SOME OF MY PREP.THE REST OF THE FAMILY WAKES UP AT ABOUT 7.3OAM. FIRST MY MOTHER HAS A BATH AND THEN MY FATHER. AT LONG LAST WE GO DOWNSTAIRS TO BREAKFAST. MY SISTER EATS HER BREAKFAST SO FAST IT'S UNBELIEVABLE. WHEN SHE'S FINISHED SHE RUSHES INTO THE PLAYROOM WHERE SHE STAYS FOR MOST OF THE DAY. AT 9.OAM I GO TRAMPOLINING AT THE SPORTS CENTRE. I FINISH MY TRAMPOLINING AT IOAM. SOMETIMES WE GO SHOPPING. IF WE DON'T, WE GO HOME AND I FINISH MY PREP. AT ABOUT 12NOON WE HAVE LUNCH. AFTER LUNCH MY PARENTS HAVE COFFEE. USUALLY WE GO FOR A WALK OR WE GO TO A MUSEUM OR A STATELY HOME. SOMETIMES WE AMUSE OURSELVES OR JUST GET UNDER EACH OTHER'S FEET. OUR BED TIME IS 8.45, BUT I USUALLY READ A LITTLE.
